text: Piotr Gurzęda (born 23 February 1987 in Giżycko) is a Polish football defender, who currently plays for Finnish club Oulun Palloseura. He made his debut in the Russian First Division for FC Shinnik Yaroslavl on April 4, 2011 in a game against FC Khimki. On August 18, 2012 Gurzęda joined Oulun Palloseura in the Finnish second tier Ykkönen. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland Category:FC Shinnik Yaroslavl players Category:Oulun Palloseura players Category:People from Giżycko Category:Sportspeople from Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship Category:Association football defenders
title: Piotr Gurzęda
